channel.title: Comments on: Rare animation?
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Pretty-Spooky
item.dc:creator: Pretty-Spooky
item.description: I’d say it’s pretty rare, only seen it once myself while playing combined arms by myself
item.content:encoded: I’d say it’s pretty rare, only seen it once myself while playing combined arms by myself

item.title: By: LAUS_art
item.dc:creator: LAUS_art
item.description: Doesn't feel rare because everyone posts it to this group when it happens ;P
item.content:encoded: Doesn’t feel rare because everyone posts it to this group when it happens ;P

item.title: By: Adonis_pleco
item.dc:creator: Adonis_pleco
item.description:
I don’t know if its just me, but if i am playing with the m1 g then i get garand thumb almost every game.
This animation i have gotten so many times i have lost count and don’t pay attention to it anymore.
item.content:encoded:
I don’t know if its just me, but if i am playing with the m1 g then i get garand thumb almost every game.

This animation i have gotten so many times i have lost count and don’t pay attention to it anymore.

item.title: By: ShookeSpear
item.dc:creator: ShookeSpear
item.description: May the force be with you.

item.title: By: f18effect
item.dc:creator: f18effect
item.description: When i saw it lots of time ago (maybe even the first to see it) i tought it was a bug because the game was very buggy at the time
